definition: abbr. for Egypt 埃及[Ai1 ji2]

sentences.english: I have so many great memories from my time at Highbury and Emirates Stadium.
sentences.chinese: 我在海布里和埃米爾球場都留下了難忘的回憶。

sentences.english: This is Emile, my brother. He’s easily impressed.
sentences.chinese: 他是我哥哥埃米爾，他很容易引人注目。

sentences.english: “It is a marvellous city, ” Emil said.
sentences.chinese: “那是一個了不起的城市，”埃米爾說。

sentences.english: A year later, Emil boarded a train and was gone.
sentences.chinese: 一年後，埃米爾登上火車，從此再無消息。

sentences.english: “Of course he can speak, ” Emil said.
With this in mind, Emil fixed his sights on the future.
sentences.chinese: 考慮到這一點，埃米爾把他的目光投向了未來。

sentences.english: On the drive home, Emil was in very high spirits.
sentences.chinese: 在開車回家的路上，埃米爾情緒高昂。

sentences.english: First, Emil had called the lawyers.
sentences.chinese: 埃米爾首先給律師打去電話。

sentences.english: After Emil finished his tirade, he stalked back to Kostya.
sentences.chinese: 埃米爾長篇大論地罵完之後，回到克斯特亞身邊。

sentences.english: But Emile will get another chance.
